com.xxmicloxx.NoteBlockAPI.model

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xxmicloxx.NoteBlockAPI.model.Layer

  • public class Layer
extends Object
    Represents a series of notes in Note Block Studio. A Layer can have a maximum of one note per tick (20 ticks a second)
